text: Halfasian made a song and a film crip dedicated to Monnone Alone in March 2021. Between lockdown 5 and 6 in the same year, Monnone Alone invited Halfasian to play with them at Brunswick Ballroom. Halfasian was quite sure that this show will be cancelled due to the pandemic restrictions, but practised over video calls just in case. First time and possibly last time Halfasian played a show with a microphone, a sound system and lighting. This will be talked about as a 25 mins of fame till we stop.
One of the best honoured moments for Halfasian was to be asked to play with Burnt Sausages in 2022. We all had fun at the BBQ Party song
